QuestData.Title: Lordaeron
QuestData.Description: Ride with me to the Sepulcher, $n. There are many things I wish to discuss with you. It is imperative that you understand the history of Lordaeron and the plight of the Forsaken.
QuestData.LogDescription: Accompany Lady Sylvanas Windrunner to the Sepulcher in Silverpine Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Do you now understand the importance of our mission here? Crowley and his Alliance dogs must be stopped!

Objectives.Objective: Lady Sylvanas Windrunner accompanied to the Sepulcher.
